name: reg-query
shortDecription: Display the values of keys and sub keys in the registry.

name: reg-restore
shortDecription:
Restore a key and its values from a backup file.
See `reg-save` for more information.

name: reg-save
shortDecription: Save a registry key, its sub keys and values to a file.

name: reg-unload
shortDecription: Remove data from the registry that was loaded using the `reg load` command.

name: reg
shortDecription:
A command line interface for managing keys and their values in the Windows registry.
See `reg-query`, `reg-add` and other pages for additional information.

name: repair-bde
shortDecription: Attempt to repair or decrypt a damaged BitLocker-encrypted volume.

name: rmdir
shortDecription: Remove a directory and its contents.

name: set
shortDecription: Display or set environment variables for the current instance of CMD.

name: sfc
shortDecription: Scans the integrity of Windows system files.

name: sigverif
shortDecription: A GUI signature verification tool for checking system files.

name: subst
shortDecription: Associates a path with a virtual drive letter.

name: systeminfo
shortDecription: Display operating system configuration for a local or remote machine.

name: taskkill
shortDecription: Terminate a process by its process id or name.

name: tasklist
shortDecription: Display a list of currently running processes on a local or remote machine.

name: tree
shortDecription: Display a graphical tree of the directory structure for a path.
